content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetLocations path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/monitoring/v2/stacks/{stack_id}/locations content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get monitoring locations
responses
200
v2getlocationsresponse
type obj
results
type arr
monitoringv2location
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a locations unique identifier
name
type str
desc a locations name
city
type str
desc a locations city
citycode
type str
desc a locations city expressed as an iata airport code
country
type str
desc a locations country
countrycode
type str
desc a locations iso31661 alpha2 country code
provider
type str
desc a locations network provider
ipaddresses
type str
desc the ip addresses of a location

the ip addresses where monitoring checks originate from
hasipv4
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a location supports ipv4 monitoring checks
hasipv6
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a location supports ipv6 monitoring checks
desc a location which performs monitoring checks
desc the list of monitoring locations for a stack
desc a response from a request to retrieve locations
title: 10_Infrastructure_GetLocations_59.json
